flow.descriptionCdata:
531e6707-1640-40b2-a325-7273b3f0d289.0105e101-c89e-4781-afe7-6c7984a37081.description=
Iterates through a list of values. Modifying the value of the list and delimiter inputs during iteration is not generally supported.

Inputs\:
list - The list to iterate through.
separator - A delimiter that separates elements in the list.

Returns\:
The current element of the list, if the response is has more

Responses\:
has more - Another value was in the list, and has been returned.
has no more - The iterator has gone fully through the list. This response will only be returned once per iteration through the list, a subsequent call to the Iterator will restart the Iteration through the list.
failure - failed to process the list.

Note\: Where the iterator is in the list is tracked by each step's unique id. Therefore you can iterate on the same list from multiple steps simultaneously.

WARNING\: Any step that will use the results of this Iterator operation will, by default, attempt to assign that step's inputs from a flow variable. If this is left checked, then the first element of the iterator will be used for every cycle of iteration.
531e6707-1640-40b2-a325-7273b3f0d289.056a4dc9-8537-4523-8d99-23ee45855100.prompt=User Identifier 531e6707-1640-40b2-a325-7273b3f0d289.0cd8ff23-248e-4cf5-a554-e96323a6332f.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz 531e6707-1640-40b2-a325-7273b3f0d289.1a71ef09-b4ec-443c-af94-794758f0aa12.description=
Compares two strings, returning a true response if and only if they contain the same sequence of characters. A null string is considered to be equal to an empty string.

Inputs\:
string1 - The first string.
string2 - The second string.
ignoreCase - If set to 'true', then the comparison ignores case considerations. The two strings are considered equal ignoring case if they are of the same length and corresponding characters in the two strings are equal ignoring case. If set to any value other than 'true', then the strings must match exactly to be considered equal.

responses\:
true - If the two strings are equal
false - If the two strings are not equal
531e6707-1640-40b2-a325-7273b3f0d289.23ceebe5-f7ee-485c-aee6-8f1354b980cf.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz 531e6707-1640-40b2-a325-7273b3f0d289.3ee3f411-a386-49e3-9598-ab3866197b48.description=Flex up a VM to the specific CPU Memory and Disk that is requested. Input Parameters\: serviceName -name of the service that will be created with this flow VCenterHost - vCenter host to execute against VCenterUsername - vCenter username VCenterPassword - vCenter password. virtualMachine - This is the virtual machine that will be flexed. dataStore - target datastore on the vCenter host for the VMs hostSystem - target ESX host for the VMs cpuCount - number of cpus the virtual machine should have. memSize - amount of memory the virtual machine should have. addDisk - whether or not disk should be added to the vm. Responses\: success - if the command completes execution and its exit code is 0 failure - otherwise Result Fields\: NA 531e6707-1640-40b2-a325-7273b3f0d289.41dd70f6-1f94-4f56-a3e3-627a3c9eb051.prompt=User Identifier 531e6707-1640-40b2-a325-7273b3f0d289.51c33921-afd0-47e4-841c-4d978e16eefb.prompt=User Identifier 531e6707-1640-40b2-a325-7273b3f0d289.568eb614-02d8-439b-9681-a264b65ec5e7.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
531e6707-1640-40b2-a325-7273b3f0d289.58b91e3b-e818-4713-be34-65b6a44ea706.description=This workflow returns the component properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ 531e6707-1640-40b2-a325-7273b3f0d289.5ab9916e-64ee-4080-a05c-fd77e637c1e8.prompt=Artifact ID 531e6707-1640-40b2-a325-7273b3f0d289.5b62dcbf-9174-442e-8af5-adda86f4ec84.prompt=User Identifier 531e6707-1640-40b2-a325-7273b3f0d289.905df357-8eb1-4213-9508-ddb70ebe6789.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
531e6707-1640-40b2-a325-7273b3f0d289.b4f7a5ac-5c9a-42ac-8ccb-a035e467ed95.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz 531e6707-1640-40b2-a325-7273b3f0d289.c3a8e7b2-0009-4805-afae-17a5324cdcc2.description=Check if there is atleast 2 server components in Deployed State to perform Flexin Input Parameters\: serverIds - List of server UUIDs separated by a delimiter delimiter - the list delimiter. userIdentifier - OO Application UUID to authorize a REST Call Responses\: success - if there are > 1 valid server failure - if there are <\= 1 valid server Result Fields\: NA 531e6707-1640-40b2-a325-7273b3f0d289.description=
This flow runs a flex up/flex down action on a server group. It identifies all the servers in a group and runs the flex memory action on each server to set the memory configuration based on the user input.

Inputs\:
userIdentifier	\: The user identifier associated with the CSA login	
artifactId		\: The server group component ID
host		\: The hostname or IP address of the vCenter provider
user		\: The name of the user account to login to the vCenter provider
password		\: The password of the user account to login to the vCenter provider
port		\: The port used by the vCenter provider
protocol		\: The protocol used by the vCenter provider
availableMemory	\: The memory that is available for flex operations on the vCenter provider
memoryInMb		\: The memory in MB that the server should be flex to


Response\:
success		\: Memory for all servers were flexed
ignored		\: Flex memory was not executed on at least one server as it has the same memory configuration as the desired configuration
failure		\: Flex memory failed on at least one server
531e6707-1640-40b2-a325-7273b3f0d289.eb90db53-6a39-485b-97ed-f33d3bd0df12.description=
Service to perform an HTTP GET via the Java HTTP Client

Inputs\:
url - the url to attempt to retrieve.
username - the username to authenticate to url with.
password - the password for username.
timeout - a timeout after which the connection should be terminated, or 0 for no timeout.
useCookies - Enables cookie tracking. Cookies will be stored between consecutive calls. valid options are\: true/false
followRedirects - specifies whether or not the get command should automatically follow redirects.
trustAllRoots - enables weak security over SSL. A SSH certificate is trusted even if no trusted CA issued it. valid options are\: true/false
proxy - a proxy to use when accessing the web site.
proxyPort - a port on the proxy to connect to.
proxyUsername - a username to use when connecting to the proxy.
proxyPassword - a password to use when connecting to the proxy.
encodeURL - perform URL encoding.
userAgent - if the HTTP header USER_AGENT needs to be overridden, pass in the value here
characterSet - the characterSet for HTTP Get request and response. Default is UTF-8.

Responses\:
success - URL retrieved successfully.
failure - The url could not be retrieved.
flow.name: vCenter Server Group Flex Memory

staticBinding.value: Flex Memory failed on one or more servers in server group
Flex Memory failed on one or more servers in server group

step.name: Get Deployed Servers from Servers List
